What are the genetic changes related to autosomal recessive axonal neuropathy with neuromyotonia ?,"Autosomal recessive axonal neuropathy with neuromyotonia is caused by mutations in the HINT1 gene. This gene provides instructions for making a protein that is involved in the function of the nervous system; however its specific role is not well understood.
